snippet.title: Expo Decay - #Epistle3Jam
snippet.description:
Expo Decay is a Half-Life fangame created for Epistle 3 Jam.
Available now on itch.io: http://owendeery.itch.io/expo-decay

Based on the Epistle 3 story by Marc Laidlaw (http://www.marclaidlaw.com/epistle-3/) the goal of the jam was to create a game around the (supposed) plot of Half-Life: Episode 3.

For more info follow me on http://twitter.com/owendeery

Check out more Epistle 3 Jam games at https://itch.io/jam/epistle-3-jam
